summary:
Somalia is a country in East Africa with a long coastline. It's home to about 18 million people, mostly ethnic Somalis who speak Somali and Arabic. Islam is the main religion.

In the past, Somalia was an important trading center with powerful empires. Later, it was colonized by Italy and Britain. After gaining independence in 1960, a civil war broke out in 1991. 

Today, Somalia is working towards peace and rebuilding. It faces challenges with an ongoing insurgency by a group called al-Shabaab. Somalia is part of many international organizations and is trying to develop its economy.
title: Somalia
